title: Indian National Pleads Guilty in Case Involving ‘Largest Single Cryptocurrency and Cash Seizure in DEA History’
description: An Indian national has pleaded guilty in a case involving “the largest single cryptocurrency and cash seizure” in the U.S. Drug Enforcement Administration (DEA) history. The defendant “is designated as a Consolidated Priority Target, which makes him one of the most significant drug trafficking threats in the world,” the U.S. Department of Justice (DOJ) described. […]

title: Revolutionizing College Applications – AI Startup Streamlines the Process
description: In the rapidly evolving realm of college applications, where competition is fiercer than ever, an innovative solution has emerged from the convergence of artificial intelligence and education. Easythanks, an Atlanta-based AI startup founded by Simms Jenkins and Amber Fawlkes Brinkman, aims to revolutionize the way students approach the daunting task of applying to college. By […]

title: Robotics Advancement – Achieving Human-like Fingertip Sensitivity Breakthrough
description: In a groundbreaking development in biomimetic robotics, researchers at the University of Cambridge have achieved a significant breakthrough, overcoming a formidable challenge to emulate the sensitivity of human fingertips in robots. Through a pioneering combination of sensor technology and artificial intelligence (AI), they have devised a system capable of reading braille text at a remarkable […]
